resources.string: This is an App created by John Sartain | Sartain Studio | John\'s Android Studio Tutorials to provide a code refernce and make it easier for new developers to learn quickly by learning from example.

Please reuse code in your project if you desire. You dont need to give attribution but if you can that would be appreitated. All I ask is that you dont sell this doesticly or commecrially for a profit or or other form of gain
